Encounter.Name: Renewing our not so Yummy Contract
Encounter.DescriptionText: Your sub-space transmitter hums with a new Draugar message:

Message.Text:
Dear SING,
Unfortunately, it is time to renew our contract. Would you be so kind to transfer MONEY credits into our galactic account? We promise not to feast on SING colonists, maybe even help you protect against (other) space monsters.
Regards, Ularmr, A hungey Draug.

Response.Text: Refuse to renew, you have had enough!

Message.Text:
Very well, then. This will keep us full for a while. There is nothing better than inter-galactic fast food.
Bon Apetite Ularmr
I was hoping you would say that. It is so much more fun to get your food by your own.
Oh dear, it seems like you dont have enough credits. Silly you! Oh well, freighter snacks are yummy, especially if they contain colonists.
